name: Unreal Tournament Cache
summary: Learn about .UXX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can find UXX files in the Cache folder within the Unreal Tournament directory. Additionally, you donâ€™t need to manage or open the files since the game generates and updates them automatically.

However, some players may use utilities or modifications to extract or convert UXX files to make custom maps or access game assets for modding purposes. While helpful for improving gameplay, UXX cache files may become numerous over time, potentially taking up much storage space. You can delete UXX files if they take up too much space.

instructions: UXX files are not meant to be opened. Instead, Epic Games Unreal Tournament references the files to load cached data to improve gameplay.
